_comment: bench-04: Only StatusController produces auto-migrated output.

_engine_failure_modes.nested_scope_detection: $scope.$new() inside a VariableDeclarator must set has_nested_scopes=true
_engine_failure_modes.deep_watch_detection: Third arg true to $scope.$watch must set watch_depths=['deep'] not ['shallow']
_engine_failure_modes.risk_isolation: StatusController must be SAFE — if MANUAL, per-file contamination is happening
_engine_failure_modes.compound_manual: DashboardController has both signals — engine must not require both to flag MANUAL
